channel.title: WebStorm on Matthew Bunge
channel.description: Recent content in WebStorm on Matthew Bunge

item.title: Damocles: New Tools
item.description: I just wrapped up reconfiguring Damocles to use Bootstrap and layout-wise I am extremely happy with the result. The Bootstrap integration with React is excellent and intuitive and I look forward to doing more with it. The next step is going to involve getting some more labels put up and otherwise reworking a bunch of fixed strings so it’s not like I’m going to need to wait long. In other news, I decided to treat myself and I went and bought a number of JetBrains tools, including their web development IDE “WebStorm”.
